name: cloudpanel
description: CloudPanel is an open-source control panel for managing cloud servers. It supports PHP, Node.js, and databases, and includes automatic SSL, firewall, and user-friendly UI for managing production workloads.
features: Server Control Panel: Manage cloud servers with web interface. Easy administration.
PHP & Node.js: Support for multiple runtime environments. Flexible hosting.
Database Management: Built-in database administration tools. Complete control.
Automatic SSL: Free SSL certificates with Let's Encrypt. Secure by default.
Firewall: Integrated firewall management for security. Protected servers.
User-Friendly: Intuitive UI for production workloads. Professional management.
Open Source: Free control panel for cloud servers. No licensing fees.
